topic.title: Little Red Riding Hood
topic.shortdesc: Little Red goes into the woods with her basket to Grandmothers house and meets a wolf along the way.

fig.title: Little Red Riding Hood and The Wolf

image.alt: Little Red Riding Hood enters the forest and meets the wolf

body.p: Just as soon as Little Red Riding hood steps into the forest a wolf appears.
"Where are you off to Little Red Riding Hood?" The grey wolf says.
"I am simply off to my Grandmothers to drop off some bread and medicine. She has been sick as of late." Little Red replied
"I am simply off to my Grandmothers to drop off some bread and wine. She has been sick as of late." Little Red replied
"How kind of you!" said the Wolf. "I hope your Grandmothers house is not too far into the woods, it could be dangerous at night in these woods."
"Oh, no need to worry, Mr. Wolf. Only one more mile walk. Her house stands between two oak-trees." Little Red replied.
The wolf turns to himself and talks so the younger girl can not hear and says, "If I am pull a trick on her, I must be careful."

The wolf turns to himself and talks so the younger girl can not hear and says, "The girl looks so young and healthy she will make a wonderful and delicious dinner. With the Grandmother being the appetizer. I must be careful."
The wolf turns back to the girl, "I wish you well on your journey to your Grandmothers."
"Thank you Mr. Wolf." Little red riding hood replies and continues on her way to her Grandmothers.
